column4: Okay, why is it when I boot 8.10 from cd it freezes at the first load screen (that bar translucent bar with an orange bar bouncing back and forth) but ONLY when I don't have quiet splash turned off?
sounds like it's crashing during mode changes
So the only thing to do is boot without splash and quiet every time?
I had a similar issues with an imbedded geforece2 chipset, and it would hang at other times when changing resolutions
